name: SHA384
desc: An implementation of Secure Hashing Algorithm 2 (SHA-2) hashing with a 384-bit digest.

items.name: typealias SHA384.Digest
items.desc: The digest type for a SHA384 hash function.

items.name: struct SHA384Digest
items.desc: The output of a Secure Hashing Algorithm 2 (SHA-2) hash with a 384-bit digest.

items.name: static func hash<D>(data: D) -> SHA384Digest
items.desc: Computes the SHA384 digest of the bytes in the given data instance and returns the computed digest.

items.name: func update<D>(data: D)
items.desc: Incrementally updates the hash function with the given data.

items.name: func update(bufferPointer: UnsafeRawBufferPointer)
items.desc: Incrementally updates the hash function with the contents of the buffer.

items.name: func finalize() -> SHA384.Digest
items.desc: Finalizes the hash function and returns the computed digest.

items.name: static var byteCount: Int
items.desc: The number of bytes in a SHA384 digest.

items.name: static var blockByteCount: Int
items.desc: The number of bytes that represents the hash functionâ€™s internal state.
